page.title: 16Our Visit To Richmond.
page.content: On Monday we went to Earls Orchard Field Studies Centre for 5 days and nights.It was the second time I had been away with the school. On Monday we went to the Georgian Theatre which was built in 1788 by Samuel Butler.We saw the boxes for the rich people,and the pits for the other people.We also saw the river in spate. On Tuesday we got the bus to Grinton and we walked on the hills.We discovered animal and bird tracks and visited the old lead mines. On Wednesday we walked to Easby Abbey and had our packed lunch in the frater or refectory.We then visited St. Agatha's church.In the evening we went to the baths. On Thursday we went bird watching at the Gravel Pits.We saw heron,mute swan,sparrow-hawk,partridges,greytit, robin,and kestrel.
